key.name: username
key.description: Authenticated username to InoReader throught API

key.name: access-token
key.description: Acces key to InoReader-API. Will time out at some point.

key.name: refresh-token
key.description: Token to generate new access key to InoReader-API.

key.name: api-code
key.description: Code to get access token for the first time. Gets returned after logging in via google/facebook.
